game.name: Train Simulator: West Coast Main Line North Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: One of the most significant route expansion since the launch of Train Simulator, West Coast Main Line North brings you well over 100 miles of highly-detailed railway line, with stations, yards, cuttings, viaducts and stunning scenery.
game.shortDescriptionEn: One of the most significant route expansion since the launch of Train Simulator, West Coast Main Line North brings you well over 100 miles of highly-detailed railway line, with stations, yards, cuttings, viaducts and stunning scenery.
